subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Angel McCoughtry had 28 points and the host Atlanta Dream went on a late 11-0 run to snap a four-game losing streak with an 82-75 victory over the Liberty.
snippet: Angel McCoughtry had 28 points and the host Atlanta Dream went on a late 11-0 run to snap a four-game losing streak with an 82-75 victory over the Liberty.
